events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The customer's concern has been categorized under Refund due to their request for money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your jacket purchase. I'm here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in original packaging?
My order number is 8347562. The jacket is brand new and still has all tags attached in the original packaging.
Thank you for the info. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will send shortly, and we will process your refund once received.
That sounds great, thanks for making the return process easy and quick.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Checking in to ensure the refund was received and if you have any further questions or need assistance.
Since your refund has been processed and you confirmed no further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
